name: Hands-on-Portal Application: Himawari Weather Data (by Miyoshi group)
description:
Hands-on-Portal Himawari Weather Data Application Webble

This Webble loads the Webbles necessary for the Himawari weather data application developed for the Hands-on Portal project.

A small set of Himawari data is preloaded at the start of the application, but can easily be replaced by ones own Himawari data.

This Webble is using additional Digital Dashboard 3.0 TNG Webble components.

[Part of Miyoshi Group CREST Research]
keywords: Digital Dashboard, Hands-on Portal, hop, Miyoshi group, app, dashboardTNG
author: digitalDashboardTNG
